title: Michigan High-School Shooting Suspect Displayed Warning Signs, Officials Say
sub_head: Teen’s seized journal and video showed ‘desire to shoot up a school,’ police say
body:
On Monday, the day before accused Oxford High School shooter Ethan Crumbley opened fire on his classmates at the suburban Detroit school, killing four and wounding seven, a teacher had reported that he engaged in “concerning behavior” in a classroom, according to police, prompting school officials to meet with him.
That night, Mr. Crumbley, 15 years old, created a video on his phone indicating a “desire to shoot up a school” the next day, police officials said.
